SUBWAY
Queensbay Mall (GF-136/137/138, North Zone), Bayan Lepas , Penang 11900
Sandwich Place, Salad Place, Fast Food Restaurant Get directions +60 4-640 3838 @subwayfreshbuzz subway.com
SUBWAYÂ® is the undisputed leader in fast, healthy food. Our easy-to-prepare sandwiches are made to order-right in front of the customer - using freshly baked breads, select sauces and a variety of delicious toppings.
